yatzy

Class MainAppGUI.Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • yatzy.MainAppGUI.Controller
  • Enclosing class:
    MainAppGUI

    private class MainAppGUI.Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    This class controls access to the model in this application. In this case, the model is a Yatzy game object that controls dice rolls and possible scores for each dice roll. The controller class itself maintain accumulated points and game rules.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void calcScores()
      Method to calculate and set values for the 4 different totals Calculation is done at dicerolls or 'game end' as this makes it easier to manipulate the live Textfields at runtime
      private void deSelectResultAction(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane scorePane)
      Method to remove focus from a Result Textfield and reverse any accumulated values from select action Setting isSelected for rollDiceAction() to false Taking the current scorePane Gridpane as parameter to be able to force focus the overall scorePane.
      private void easterEggAction() 
      private void endGame()
      Method for maintaining dialog and actions when a game has ended | roundCount <= MAX_ROUNDS
      private void getDices()
      Method to show the values of the 5 dices from the Yatzy game object in the 5 txfDice Textfields
      private boolean getGameStatus() 
      private void getResults()
      Method to update the txfResult Textfields with possible results from the yatzy game.
      private void getRolls()
      Method to update the lblRolled Label with amount of rolls.
      private void resetRound()
      Method to resetting all holds when a result as been selected and increasing roundCount +1
      private void rollDiceAction()
      Method to roll dices and maintain visual output for dice and hold textfields updated
      private void selectResultAction()
      Method to set accumulated values in the accumulated Textfields.
      private void setBonus()
      Method for setting the txfBonus Textfield = 50 if accumulated sum of txfSumSame is min.
      private void setTotal()
      Method for setting txfTotal for all accumulated Textfields
      private void startGameAction()
      Method to initialize all sum variables and enabling fields

        Method for maintaining dialog and actions when a game has ended | roundCount <= MAX_ROUNDS

      • calcScores

        private void calcScores()
        Method to calculate and set values for the 4 different totals Calculation is done at dicerolls or 'game end' as this makes it easier to manipulate the live Textfields at runtime

      • getDices

        private void getDices()
        Method to show the values of the 5 dices from the Yatzy game object in the 5 txfDice Textfields

      • getRolls

        private void getRolls()
        Method to update the lblRolled Label with amount of rolls.

      • getResults

        private void getResults()
        Method to update the txfResult Textfields with possible results from the yatzy game. Only Textfields in the txfResults array that is not disabled from the rollDiceAction() method will be set with a value.

      • selectResultAction

        private void selectResultAction()
        Method to set accumulated values in the accumulated Textfields. Setting the index value of txfResults (resultSelected) for rollDiceAction() Setting txfResultIsFocus for the txfResult.setOnMouseClicked event. Setting isSelected for rollDiceAction() to check if a Texfield needs to be disabled.

      • deSelectResultAction

        private void deSelectResultAction(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane scorePane)
        Method to remove focus from a Result Textfield and reverse any accumulated values from select action Setting isSelected for rollDiceAction() to false Taking the current scorePane Gridpane as parameter to be able to force focus the overall scorePane.
        Parameters:
        scorePane -

      • setBonus

        private void setBonus()
        Method for setting the txfBonus Textfield = 50 if accumulated sum of txfSumSame is min. 63

      • setTotal

        private void setTotal()
        Method for setting txfTotal for all accumulated Textfields

        private void easterEggAction()
